name: CGEventType
desc: Constants that specify the different types of input events.

items.name: case leftMouseDown
items.desc: Specifies a mouse down event with the left button.

items.name: case leftMouseUp
items.desc: Specifies a mouse up event with the left button.

items.name: case rightMouseDown
items.desc: Specifies a mouse down event with the right button.

items.name: case rightMouseUp
items.desc: Specifies a mouse up event with the right button.

items.name: case leftMouseDragged
items.desc: Specifies a mouse drag event with the left button down.

items.name: case rightMouseDragged
items.desc: Specifies a mouse drag event with the right button down.

items.name: case flagsChanged
items.desc: Specifies a key changed event for a modifier or status key.

items.name: case scrollWheel
items.desc: Specifies a scroll wheel moved event.

items.name: case otherMouseDown
items.desc: Specifies a mouse down event with one of buttons 2-31.

items.name: case otherMouseUp
items.desc: Specifies a mouse up event with one of buttons 2-31.

items.name: case otherMouseDragged
items.desc: Specifies a mouse drag event with one of buttons 2-31 down.

items.name: case tapDisabledByTimeout
items.desc: Specifies an event indicating the event tap is disabled because of timeout.

items.name: case tapDisabledByUserInput
items.desc: Specifies an event indicating the event tap is disabled because of user input.
